subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, the people of Dubai will celebrate the fact that before horse racing became known as the sport of kings, it was a sport of herdsmen, and has evolved into the sport of sheiks.
snippet: On Saturday, the people of Dubai will celebrate the fact that before horse racing became known as the sport of kings, it was a sport of herdsmen, and has evolved into the sport of sheiks.
